input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 2.5mm Franco'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban + Franco Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 2mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Italian Anchor Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='King Ice Diamond Cut Miami Cuban Link Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares brand, Cuban chain style, and silver material but is thinner (3mm vs 8mm), making it less similar in gauge and presence.
Same brand and Cuban link style, but differs in metal color (gold vs silver) and size (5mm vs 8mm), which affects similarity in material and thickness.
Same brand but different chain style (Franco vs Cuban) and significantly thinner size, making it considerably different in construction and silhouette.
Shares brand and Cuban link design but differs in size (5mm vs 8mm) and metal finish (gold vs silver), reducing relevancy.
Includes Cuban link chains but combined with Franco links, so partially relevant; offers different styles and potentially varying gauges.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 2mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style but much thinner (2mm vs 8mm) and gold instead of silver, making it less relevant.
Differs significantly in chain style (anchor vs Cuban) though both are silver; intended design and silhouette differ greatly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, similar gauge (8mm), and Cuban style but gold instead of silver and includes iced-out elements, slightly less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares brand and Cuban style but smaller gauge (5mm), gold color, and iced details, reducing relevancy.
Very similar thickness (8mm), same brand and Cuban style, but includes iced-out design and gold color, making it close but not identical.
Likely very similar chain style and size as it shares the 'Miami Cuban' reference, which matches the style closely, though brand and material specifics are unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice Diamond Cut Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Miami Cuban link style and chain type but includes diamond cutting and likely different brand and possibly different size; still fairly relevant.
